'''''Overflowing Light''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to destroy 2 [[Oozing Concretion]] with 1 [[Blooming Light]] during a battle with a [[Ruin Serpent]].
